attributes.action: Instigate criminal proceedings against all MP's who have made fraudulent claims for their expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we were guilty of shoplifting, and offered to return the goods to the shelf, would that be acceptable?  We pay 20% tax on our small pensions but have never used our financial limitations as an excuse to be dishonest.  We object to supporting parasites.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
